spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spellix's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.
